DOC.brief_summary: This project aim raise awareness improve HPV vaccination rate among child Mexican American parent implementation tailor social marketing campaign include text message reminder .
DOC.brief_title: Trial Social Marketing Campaign Increase HPV Vaccination Among Mexican American Children
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize control trial ( RCT ) assess social marketing campaign HPV vaccination without text message reminder system target Mexican Americans community-based setting , Ventanilla De Salud ( Health Window , VDS ) program Mexican Consulate . Investigators plan recruit 200 Mexican American parent child age 9 17 . Every VDS attendee eligible study willing consent participate invite study . Consenting participant randomize either follow-up reminder text message system group receive text message reminder . All participant , regardless text message arm , evaluate campaign investigator assess adherence HPV vaccine total sample .
DOC.criteria: Born Mexico bear U.S. selfdescribes MexicanAmerican Spanish her/his primary language Has minimum one child age 9 17 receive HPV vaccine live parent/guardian per self report Selfidentifies child 's main caregiver Currently own cell phone , use text messaging service willing accept text message study Will NYC area duration study period ( 69 month ) Presence serious psychiatric cognitive impairment likely preclude meaningful inform consent adherence protocol per consent professional 's judgment .
